post.description: Creates a new row for a specific item within the grid.

parameters.name: WorkspaceID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the workspace containing the item.
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace containing the item can be obtained through the GET Workspace List API call.

parameters.name: ItemID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the item for creating a grid row.
parameters.description: The ID of the item for which you want to create a grid row, can be obtained through the GET Item List API call.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.x-ms-summary: Indicates the media type of the request body.
parameters.description: Indicates the media type of the request body. In this case, the request body is expected to be in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available transitions for a specific workspace.

parameters.name: WorkspaceID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the workspace for retrieving the transition list.
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace for which you want to retrieve a list of transition can be obtained through the GET Workspace List API call.

parameters.name: ItemID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of an item inside the workspace.
parameters.description: The ID of an item inside the workspace, can be obtained through the GET Item List API call.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available transitions for a specific item based on the logged-in user.

parameters.name: WorkspaceID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the workspace for retrieving available transitions.
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace for which you want to retrieve a list of available transitions, can be obtained through the GET Workspace List API call.

get.description: Retrieves a list of records and fields for a specific tab.

parameters.name: WorkspaceID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the workspace containing the item.
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace containing the item can be obtained through the GET Workspace List API call.

parameters.name: ItemID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the item for retrieving records and fields for a tab/view.
parameters.description: The ID of the item for which you want to retrieve a list of records and fields for a specific tab/view, can be obtained through the GET Item List API call.

parameters.name: ViewID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the tab/view for details retrieval.
parameters.description: The ID of the tab/view for which you want to retrieve details.

post.description: Performs a transition on a specific item. Returns 403 even when successful.

parameters.name: WorkspaceID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the workspace containing the item.
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace containing the item can be obtained through the GET Workspace List API call.

parameters.name: ItemID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the item for performing a transition.
parameters.description: The ID of the item on which you want to perform a transition, can be obtained through the GET Item List API call.

parameters.name: WorkflowID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the workflow transition to perform.
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow transition that you want to perform.

parameters.name: content-location
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the location of the resource or content.
parameters.description: Specifies the location of the resource or content. This must be a valid URL or path to where the content is hosted or retrieved from.

application/json.message: Unable to transition to 1234. Transition not a valid for current item state.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all sections on the Item Details tab.

parameters.name: WorkspaceID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the workspace for retrieving item details sections.
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace for which you want to retrieve item details sections configuration, can be obtained through the GET Workspace List API call.

post.description: Creates a new relationship for a specific item.

parameters.name: WorkspaceID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the workspace containing the item.
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace containing the item can be obtained through the GET Workspace List API call.

parameters.name: ItemID
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the ID of the item for creating a new relationship.
parameters.description: The ID of the item for which you create a new relationship (link it with another item), can be obtained through the GET Item List API call.

parameters.name: content-location
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the location of a specific item within a workspace.
parameters.description: Specifies the location of a specific item within a workspace. The value contains placeholders like :WorkspaceID and :ItemID, which need to be replaced with actual IDs.
